label: ProductBatch
comment: The ProductBatch class holds information related to a specific batch of products, including manufacturing details, sustainability claims and provenance information.

datatypeProperties.comment: A unique identifier (URI) assigned to the product batch. (Link Resolver - GS1-128?)
The Facility where the product batch was manufactured.
The ISO 8601 date on which the product batch was manufactured.
An array of Provenance objects providing details on the origin of components or ingredients of the product batch.
The serial number(s) of the product or products in the batch, represented as text.
An array of SustainabilityClaim objects representing various sustainability claims about the product batch.
An array of TraceabilityEvent objects detailing EPCIS events related to the traceability of the product batch.

referencedBy.comment: Information regarding the specific batch the product belongs to, encapsulated in a ProductBatch object.
